title: Va Macha Va Chennai Super Kings CSK Theme Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Va Macha Va IPL 2012 Song Track
By Bob Syed, Ganesan, Imtiaz Ghani, Karthik Srinivas.

Vettri Kodi Katta vaada
VInnai thaandi mutta vaada
Unnai vella yaarum illa
thuninju nillada

Thottathellaam sixer thaanda
Dhool paraka pogudhada
Mattayaala aduchu adichu 
pattayakalapuda

CHENNAI - ho
SUPER   - ho
KINGS   - HO
Chennai Super Kings HO

CHENNAI - ho
SUPER   - ho
KINGS   - HO
Chennai Super Kings HO

Veeraadhi veeran ellaam 
sooradhi sooran ellaam 
unkitta thorka poraan
va va va

Vettri pala kottu thada
Yettu thikkum paakudhada
Aethiri mugam verkudhada 
va.... 

Poraada thuninjavan nee
poraattam therinjavan nee
Poraadum neramidhu 
va va va.

Nee adikum pandheduka
roket vittu thaedatume
Nee nenacha mudiyumada vaa

Sooraavaliya pola
suthi suthi adikanum
MInnala odi 
ne runna kuvikanum

jaikanum jaikanum jaikanum
va va va

C Maamu
S Maamu 
K Maamu 
Chennai Super Kings .

Vettri Kodi Katta vaada
VInnai thaandimutta vaada
Unnai vella yaarum illa
thuninju nillada

Thottathellaam sixer thaanda
Dhool paraka pogudhada
Mattayaala aduchu adichu 
pattayakalapuda

raja muraliyada
adichaar namma hayden ada
20-20 king Dhoniyada
chennai super kings-u 
vada vada

Six-u adicha pandhu parakum
bowling pota stemp-u agirum
fielding panna pori kelambum
sariya sariya sariya

Seeri varum pandhayellam 
paayum puli pola neyum
paanchi paanchi catch-u
panna va va va

Kal-u rendum sakkaranda
Kai-u rendum rekkaiyada
parakum pandha yetti pidika
va ...

Yevugana pola neeyum
aeriyum pandhu stump-u ellam
boomi thaandi parakanumda 
vaa va

Chennai Super kingsnna
Stadium-mey adhiranumda
Singam pola ne elundhu va

Vettri unna illaku
adhai ullathil niruthada

Chennai super kings-u 
neenga champions-u da


jaikanum jaikanum jaikanum
va va va

C Maamu
S Maamu 
K Maamu 
Chennai Super Kings .

jaikanum jaikanum jaikanum
va va va

C Maamu  Ho
S Maamu  Ho
K Maamu  HO 
Chennai Super Kings- Hoooo
